review_data.title: Nice Italian Ambiente, excellent food
review_data.content: Beautiful pop-up pearl restaurant near Bahnhof Stadelhofen. Nice Southern Italian Ambiente. Delicious traditional food from Apulian tradition, cooked by the *Mammas*. Every week a new menu. It has a small terrace on the road, but I recommend to book a table inside (with air conditioning)....More
